ComicInfo.Title: Sightless In a Savage Land
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue consists of 3 stories the first is titled "Sightless, in a Savage Land!" and is a reprint from Daredevil #12 the second is an original story called "From the Sky... Winged Wrath" staring Angel the third and final story is a reprint entitled "The Secret of Ka-Zar's Origin!" from Daredevil #13.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-30 18:57:49. [CVDB11160]
ComicInfo.Characters: Angel, Ape-Man, Bird-Man, Candy Southern, Cat-Man, Daredevil, Dazzler, Electro, Foggy Nelson, Fred Duncan, Frog-Man, Ka-Zar, Karen Page, Kathryn Worthington, Lord Robert Plunder, Maa-Gor, Matador, Mr. Fear (Drago), Namor, Organizer, Owl, Parnival Plunder, Stilt-Man, Warren Worthington Jr., Weylin Feepers, Zabu
ComicInfo.Locations: England, Hell's Kitchen, Law Offices of Nelson and Murdock, New York City, New York State, Plunder Castle, Savage Land, Skull Island
